title: SCP-4666

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player's house at night to prepare for a Weissnacht Event.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On the night you choose a target, you will learn who they visit and who visits them.
- The night after you target a player, you will deal an Unstoppable rampaging attack at their house. Additionally, you will kidnap one player that you would normally attack. This favors anyone who would survive your attack, then visitors, then your target.
- A kidnapped player will be announced missing from the Town square the following day. They will lose access to any game-related chats that they are in.
- If you are attacked, you will not die. Instead, the Town will discover a horribly disfigured life-size doll resembling the first remaining player you have kidnapped. It is at this point that they will be as announced dead and access to all in-game chats are restored.
- You may not perform the factional kill on the night of your rampage.
